pkgmetadata.longdescription: Reshape Disorganised Messy Data // Helps the user to build and register schema descriptions of disorganised (messy) tables. Disorganised tables are tables that are not in a topologically coherent form, where packages such as 'tidyr' could be used for reshaping. The schema description documents the arrangement of input tables and is used to reshape them into a standardised (tidy) output format.
